DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the concentration of [6R] 5,10-methylene-THF, 5-formyl-THF, 5-methyl-THF and THF in the tumor, in adjacent mucosa and in plasma in patients with colon cancer receiving two different does of Modufolin® and Levoleucovorin (Isovorin®) respectively (60 and 200 mg/m2).
DOC.brief_title: PK/PD Investigation of Modufolin® in Plasma, Tumor and Adjacent Mucosa in Patients With Colon Cancer
DOC.criteria: Patients must have operable colon cancer that is amenable to curative surgery.
